Hellplague:
 
"We'll have to sneak back to the planet.  But first, I'll have to occupy Injustice.  He has the same sensors Malice does, plus, I know what he's thinking, roughly.  He's been suspicous.  We'll have to do something to keep the others away.  But, what?  We have to get to the planet, no one can hear us there," Hellplague said, looking over to Blacknightmare.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

"The same that I was spoken"said the femme and talking to Hellplague 
she said"But if we have to go to other safe place to talk, we must 
plan it... carefully"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice/ Hellplague:
>  
> Malice looked at Blacknightmare as she broke the kiss.  He looked 
over to Hellplague, who appeared hurt.
>  
> "I'll be fine.  Sis, we should tell him.  But not here, not now.  
We need to ge back down there," Hellplague said, her voice far off.
> Malice was confused by this, his expression showed it.
> "What is she talking about?" he asked Blacknightmare.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Blacknightmare:
> 
> Suddenly Blacknightmare broke the kiss and looked her sister sat 
> around, pretending look as normal she smiled to her sister and 
> said "Ahh, Hellplagu, how do you feel?"
> 
>
